apis.name: Update existing submodule reference in repository
apis.description: In some workflows, especially automated ones, it can be useful to update a submoduleâ€™s reference to keep up to date other projects that use it. This endpoint allows you to update a Git submodule reference in a specific branch.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: submodule
attributes.description: URL-encoded full path to the submodule. For example, lib%2Fclass%2Erb

attributes.name: branch
attributes.description: Name of the branch to commit into

attributes.name: commit_sha
attributes.description: Full commit SHA to update the submodule to

attributes.name: commit_message
attributes.description: Commit message. If no message is provided, a default is set
